content: अयशस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Disreputable, infamous, disgraceful; also अयशस्क in this sense. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} (शः) Infamy, disgrace, ignominy, ill-repute, stain, dishonour, scandal; अयशो महदाप्नोति <ls>Ms. 8. 128</ls>; किमयशो ननु घोरमतः परं <ls>U. 3. 27</ls>; स्वभावलोलेत्ययशः प्रमृष्टं <ls>R. 6. 41.</ls>
